content.prompt: In many less developed countries, only a small percentage of school-aged youth attend school regularly. In some cases, fewer females than males are enrolled in schools. Which of the following patterns is a concern in less developed countries with low school enrollment?

choices.label: A lack of jobs for older males because of the high number of qualified females
A large number of females working in factories because most males work in agriculture
A lack of qualified males and females to develop a workforce that will improve economic growth
A migration comprised entirely of working-age females to other countries for better-paying jobs
A migration of males and females to other countries to pursue postsecondary education

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe spatial patterns, networks, and relationships.
